subtitle: Choose an option to proceed with your wellness journey

card1.title: Measure Vitals With BLE Devices
card1.desc1: Use Bluetooth-enabled devices to measure your vitals such as blood pressure, heart rate, and weight.

card2.title: Enter Manual Health Readings
card2.desc1: Manually input your health data like weight, blood pressure, or heart rate.

card3.title: View Health History
card3.desc1: Access your saved health records and track your progress over time.
card3.desc2: Visualize trends in your vitals through easy-to-read charts and summaries.

tagline: Track your health, transform your life!

vitals_measurement.title: Measure Your Vitals
vitals_measurement.instructions:
Follow the steps below to record your vitals.
 You can skip any measurement if needed.
vitals_measurement.camera_instruction: Please stand in front of the camera to measure your height.
vitals_measurement.footer: Track your health, transform your life!
